overview:
Jimmy Hendricks is Co-Founder and CEO of Deal Current, one of the nation’s fastest growing “white label” daily deal software companies.

Deal Current’s hosted social commerce solutions and sales force training tools help media publishers implement their very own revenue-generating daily deal platform in 30 days or less.

Under Jimmy’s leadership, Deal Current has achieved rapid market penetration in 66 cities serving respected media leaders including American Consolidated Media, Journal Broadcast Group, Buffalo News, and the Pittsburgh Post Gazette. The company is on track to launch “white label” daily deal programs in 100+ markets in 2011.

A 2010 San Diego Business Journal Most Admired CEO nominee, Hendricks brings 10 years of experience in sales strategy, product development, advertising sales, and team building to the Deal Current team.

Prior to founding Deal Current, Hendricks was an executive at Active.com, a leading provider of application services technology and marketing solutions for community service and participatory sports organizations with $300M+ annual revenues.
